seo.title: About SustainSage
seo.description: Understand how SustainSage grounds bilingual, ICF-aligned coaching in supervision, ethics, and UK-lived experience so clients stay in charge.

hero.title: Coaching that honours consent, pace, and context
hero.subtitle: We are an ICF-aligned, bilingual coaching partnership based in the UK. Every conversation is co-created with you — no scripts, no guarantees, just calm, accountable space.
hero.note: Coaching is not therapy, counselling, legal, financial, or immigration advice.

pillars.title: What guides our coaching
pillars.intro: These pillars shape every session before, during, and after we meet.

items.title: How we coach
items.description: Non-directive, question-led conversations paced by you. We surface patterns, offer reflections, and pause for consent whenever depth shifts.

items.title: What you can expect
items.description: Sessions start and end on time, with goals and boundaries agreed in advance. If we notice scope creep or red flags, we name them and re-contract together.

items.title: How we stay accountable
items.description: We invest in supervision, continued professional development, and reflective practice so our work stays ethical, culturally aware, and responsive.

story.title: Why we built SustainSage
paragraphs: Diaspora professionals told us they were tired of being pushed to ‘stay positive’ while juggling visas, families, or health. We created SustainSage to hold conversations where complexity is welcome.

Our practice is intentionally bilingual and culturally curious. We work in English, Traditional Chinese, or Simplified Chinese, and we encourage you to switch languages whenever it helps you think more clearly.

agreements.title: Before we begin, we will
items: Clarify goals, success markers, fees, scheduling, cancellation, and safeguarding in writing.
Discuss confidentiality limits, data handling, and how we store notes within UK GDPR requirements.
Signpost therapy, legal, immigration, financial, or medical support if those needs arise. Coaching will pause or stop when another profession is more appropriate.

fit.title: Is this space for you?
fit.notForLabel: Not the right fit if you
for: Want room to organise thoughts, make sense of competing responsibilities, and define your own next steps.
Are ready to take responsibility for decisions and actions, even when you need accountability along the way.
Are navigating cultural transition in the UK — relocation, returning to work, role shifts, or leading across cultures.
notFor: Are in acute psychological crisis or need clinical, counselling, or psychiatric care.
Need professional answers in legal, immigration, medical, or financial matters.
Prefer someone else to decide for you or promise specific outcomes.

practice.title: How sessions feel in practice
practice.intro: Clients often describe our coaching as calm, spacious, and structured enough to move ideas forward without pressure.
points: We invite you to set the agenda each time and choose how deep to go. You can stop, slow down, or pause whenever needed.
We may offer frameworks or experiments, yet you always choose what to accept, adapt, or decline.
Reflection, not extraction: we focus on building your awareness and confidence rather than collecting data for us.

dataProtection.title: How we protect your data & boundaries
dataProtection.body: We follow the ICF Code of Ethics and UK data protection law. Notes are kept minimal and stored securely. Confidentiality is upheld except where legal obligations or safeguarding risks require disclosure, which we will discuss transparently.
